## M3 Expressive: Design with emotion
Build more usable and engaging products with emotion-driven UX. M3 Expressive adds vibrant [colors](https://m3.material.io/styles/color/system/overview?utm_source=homepage&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=IO25), intuitive [motion](https://m3.material.io/styles/motion/overview?utm_source=homepage&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=IO25), adaptive [components](https://m3.material.io/components?utm_source=homepage&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=IO25), flexible [typography](https://m3.material.io/styles/typography/overview?utm_source=homepage&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=IO25), and contrasting [shapes](https://m3.material.io/styles/shape/overview-principles?utm_source=homepage&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=IO25).

## Visit SCAD for the holidays
Join SCAD this holiday season to discover all The University for Creative Careers has to offer. Request your in-person tour — including Saturdays! — to experience our locations in Midtown Atlanta and charming Savannah, Ga.
[Explore tour options](https://www.scad.edu/admission/visit-scad)
## Why choose SCAD? Let us show you.
Across 100 programs, you'll discover the unparalleled connections, resources, and support you need to turn your passion into purpose. Make it here at SCAD.
[Dive into the SCAD experience](https://www.scad.edu/admission/why-scad)
## Find haptic enchantment at DESIGN MIAMI.
Celebrate a delightful collection of fibers, lighting design, furniture design, and sculpture at Miami Art Week 2025, as SCAD presents an installation of alumni work exclusively at DESIGN MIAMI.
[View event details](https://www.scad.edu/scad-design-miami-2025)
## SCAD ranked No. 1 Design University in the Americas and Europe
SCAD has been named the No. 1 design university in the Americas and Europe by the internationally acclaimed Red Dot Design Ranking, making SCAD the only U.S. institution recognized in the top five.
[View awards](https://www.scad.edu/about/awards-and-rankings)
## Find the information you need to apply to SCAD
Curious about the SCAD admission process? Searching for details about the application requirements, scholarships, deadlines, and more? We have all the information you need to get started.
[View admission information](https://www.scad.edu/admission/admission-information)
